\begin{array}{rl}\n{A} & {\operatorname{Sen} \Varangle B=?} \\\n{} & {\operatorname{Cos} \Varangle B=?} \\\n{} & {\operatorname{Tan} \Varangle B=?} \\\n{12 \mathrm{cm}} & {\cot \Varangle B=?} \\\n{} & {\operatorname{Sec} \Varangle B=?} \\\n{} & {\operatorname{Csc} \Varangle B=?}\n\end{array}[imath]{A} & {\operatorname{Sen} \Varangle B=?} [/imath] [imath]{} & {\operatorname{Cos} \Varangle B=?} [/imath] [imath]{} & {\operatorname{Tan} \Varangle B=?} [/imath] [imath]{12 \mathrm{cm}} & {\cot \Varangle B=?} [/imath] [imath]{} & {\operatorname{Sec} \Varangle B=?} [/imath] [imath]{} & {\operatorname{Csc} \Varangle B=?}[/imath]
